Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Austin
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Austin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC Halsted due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC Halsted due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
